dataIdInfo.idPurp: Summarizes the values of a raster(s) within the zones of a feature layer and reports the results to a table (csv only). Must be run through ArcPro.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Summarizes the values of a raster(s) within the zones of a feature layer and reports the results to a table (csv only). Must be run through ArcPro. Summarizes each raster in a designated folder for each zone in a vector dataset. Each table is merged into one using pandas.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Derek Olson, Joshua Reynolds, Peter Davis, GTAC, RedCastle Resources
